name: Sonic The Goblin Slayer
description:
You need to download rpgmaker xp RTP from website to play game

umm this is a tar linux archive since i made this game on ubuntu using wine, so it will be weird to install and stuff.

This is a test project in rmxp where Sonic has been sent to another dimension to save it from a goblin invasion, btw if you want to know the context of this game.
